#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	int pi, yi, T;
	long long N;

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d", &pi, &yi);

		N = pi;

		while (yi > 2000)
		{
			N *= N;
			N %= M;
			yi--;
		}

		printf("%lld\n", N);
	}

	return 0;
}
